channel.title: [Request] - [508] Blank Client And Server! [508]
channel.description:
I have a 317 server and client, but i don't like it becuase there's no emotes, can't get shop.cfg to work correctly, and when i open the item.cfg and add an item to the shop it is always the wrong item! So, im just looking around for anyone who has the link to the download that has full emotes working, shop.cfg works, and item list is in order! I am also willing to accept a [Blank]510 Client And Server[Blank] If anyone has it please post it in here so i can download it! :mad: :eek: :D
[Off Topic] Also i'm wondering if the coding and everything works the same way as a 317 server if not, thats fine i really need to work on my coding anyway! :confused: :confused:
Thanks To - Who Ever Puts The Link In This Post! ;D :rolleyes: :cool:

item.title: [Request] - [508] Blank Client And Server! [508]
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“moerin, post:2, topic:373176”]This isn’t a request section

Use the search button…

Also read the rules… One of them is:
5) No Requests Rather straightforward - don’t post a topic requesting a certain source download link to be given to you. Use your resources such as the search button to your advantage. Doing so will result in a warning or moderation. [/quote]

Read full topic
